title: Looking for a Haryanvi video song which seems to have been completely wiped from the internet
selftext:
Some lyrics: "Beedi aali, beedi pya de!"

It's a satirical take on the song "pani aali pani pya de" from way back (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a579Cgc4CkU).

The video featured a large green man, I believe the song is Haryanvi as well.

Any links, or videos anyone can send my way?
cleaned_text: looking haryanvi video song seems completely wiped internet lyrics beedi aali beedi pya de satirical take song pani aali pani pya de way back httpswwwyoutubecomwatchvacgccku video featured large green man believe song haryanvi well links videos anyone send way
